verses.verse: "Observe <WH8104> the month <WH2320> of Abib <WH24> and celebrate <WH6213> the Passover <WH6453> to the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> for in the month <WH2320> of Abib <WH24> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> brought <WH3318> you out of Egypt <WH4714> by night. <WH3915>

"And you shall sacrifice <WH2076> the Passover <WH6453> to the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> from the flock <WH6629> and the herd, <WH1241> in the place <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH8033> the Lord <WH3068> chooses <WH977> to establish <WH7931> His name. <WH8034>

"You shall not eat <WH398> leavened <WH2557> bread <WH2557> with it; seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you shall eat <WH398> with it unleavened <WH4682> bread, <WH4682> the bread <WH3899> of affliction <WH6040> (for you came <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> in haste <WH2649>), in order <WH4616> that you may remember <WH2142> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of your life <WH9132> the day <WH3117> when you came <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

"For seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> no <WH3808> leaven <WH7603> shall be seen <WH7200> with you in all <WH3605> your territory, <WH1366> and none <WH3808> of the flesh <WH1320> which <WH834> you sacrifice <WH2076> on the evening <WH6153> of the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> shall remain <WH3885> overnight <WH3885> until morning. <WH1242>
"You are not allowed <WH3201> to sacrifice <WH2076> the Passover <WH6453> in any <WH259> of your towns <WH8179> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> is giving <WH5414> you;

but at the place <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH8033> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> chooses <WH977> to establish <WH7931> His name, <WH8034> you shall sacrifice <WH2076> the Passover <WH6453> in the evening <WH6153> at sunset, <WH8121> <WH935> at the time <WH4150> that you came <WH3318> out of Egypt. <WH4714>

"And you shall cook <WH1310> and eat <WH398> [it] in the place <WH4725> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> chooses. <WH977> And in the morning <WH1242> you are to return <WH6437> <WH1980> to your tents. <WH168>

"Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> you shall eat <WH398> unleavened <WH4682> bread, <WH4682> and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> there shall be a solemn <WH6116> assembly <WH6116> to the Lord <WH3068> your God; <WH430> you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> work <WH4399> [on it.]

"You shall count <WH5608> seven <WH7651> weeks <WH7620> for yourself; you shall begin <WH2490> to count <WH5608> seven <WH7651> weeks <WH7620> from the time you begin <WH2490> to put the sickle <WH2770> to the standing <WH7054> grain. <WH7054>

"Then you shall celebrate <WH6213> the Feast <WH2282> of Weeks <WH7620> to the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> with a tribute <WH4530> of a freewill <WH5071> offering <WH5071> of your hand, <WH3027> which <WH834> you shall give <WH5414> just <WH3152> as the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> blesses <WH1288> you;

and you shall rejoice <WH8055> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> you and your son <WH1121> and your daughter <WH1323> and your male <WH5650> and female <WH519> servants <WH5650> <WH519> and the Levite <WH3881> who <WH834> is in your town, <WH8179> and the stranger <WH1616> and the orphan <WH3490> and the widow <WH490> who <WH834> are in your midst, <WH7130> in the place <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH8033> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> chooses <WH977> to establish <WH7931> His name. <WH8034>
"And you shall remember <WH2142> that you were a slave <WH5650> in Egypt, <WH4714> and you shall be careful <WH8104> to observe <WH6213> these <WH428> statutes. <WH2706>

"You shall celebrate <WH6213> the Feast <WH2282> of Booths <WH5521> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> after you have gathered <WH622> in from your threshing <WH1637> floor <WH1637> and your wine <WH3342> vat; <WH3342>

and you shall rejoice <WH8055> in your feast, <WH2282> you and your son <WH1121> and your daughter <WH1323> and your male <WH5650> and female <WH519> servants <WH5650> <WH519> and the Levite <WH3881> and the stranger <WH1616> and the orphan <WH3490> and the widow <WH490> who <WH834> are in your towns. <WH8179>

"Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you shall celebrate <WH2287> a feast <WH2287> to the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> chooses, <WH977> because <WH3588> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> will bless <WH1288> you in all <WH3605> your produce <WH8393> and in all <WH3605> the work <WH4639> of your hands, <WH3027> so that you shall be altogether <WH389> joyful. <WH8056>

"Three <WH7969> times <WH6471> in a year <WH8141> all <WH3605> your males <WH2138> shall appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which <WH834> He chooses, <WH977> at the Feast <WH2282> of Unleavened <WH4682> Bread <WH4682> and at the Feast <WH2282> of Weeks <WH7620> and at the Feast <WH2282> of Booths, <WH5521> and they shall not appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> empty-handed.
"Every <WH376> man <WH376> shall give <WH4979> as he is able, <WH3027> according to the blessing <WH1293> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> which <WH834> He has given <WH5414> you.

"You shall appoint <WH5414> for yourself judges <WH8199> and officers <WH7860> in all <WH3605> your towns <WH8179> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> is giving <WH5414> you, according to your tribes, <WH7626> and they shall judge <WH8199> the people <WH5971> with righteous <WH6664> judgment. <WH4941>

"You shall not distort <WH5186> justice; <WH4941> you shall not be partial, <WH5234> <WH6440> and you shall not take <WH3947> a bribe, <WH7810> for a bribe <WH7810> blinds <WH5786> the eyes <WH5869> of the wise <WH2450> and perverts <WH5557> the words <WH1697> of the righteous. <WH6662>

"Justice, <WH6664> [and only] justice, <WH6664> you shall pursue, <WH7291> that you may live <WH2421> and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> is giving <WH5414> you.

"You shall not plant <WH5193> for yourself an Asherah <WH842> of any <WH3605> kind of tree <WH6086> beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196> of the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> which <WH834> you shall make <WH6213> for yourself.
"Neither <WH3808> shall you set <WH6965> up for yourself a [sacred] pillar <WH4676> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> hates. <WH8130>
